plot: Claudio Becerra Rebolledo earns a living playing keyboard along the public bus routes of Santiago, Chile. In this documentary we accompanied Claudio for one of his mobile concerts.
title: Teclaudius
plot_es: Claudio Becerra Rebolledo earns a living playing keyboard along the public bus routes of Santiago, Chile. In this documentary we accompanied Claudio for one of his mobile concerts.
